New light on drone war's death toll in Pakistan

American drone strikes inside Pakistan are killing far fewer civilians than many in the country are led to believe, according to a report by the AP. (AP)

Officers in police shooting agreed to meet

Hamilton Sgt. Ken Nagy and Beverly Officer Jason Lantych had agreed to meet Friday night before Nagy shot Lanytch, though it wasn't clear why they were meeting, Essex District Attorney Jonathan Blodgett said. (AP)

Winds leave thousands without power

Strong winds have downed tree branches across the state today, leaving thousands without power. Ferry service to Nantucket was also cancelled. (Globe, 6:20 p.m.)
